parameters.query: INSERT INTO description_bulk_update_jobs (id, status, target_scope, target_channel_ids, target_video_ids, update_type, find_pattern, replacement_text, reason, created_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), 'pending', $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, NOW()) RETURNING id

UPDATE description_bulk_update_jobs SET success_count = success_count + CASE WHEN $2 = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, failure_count = failure_count + CASE WHEN $2 = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1
UPDATE description_bulk_update_jobs SET skipped_count = skipped_count + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1
